name: Soaring - beta test
description:
Soaring

Hey there, this is a beta test of my upcoming challenging platformer about a chicken climbing upwards (exact story isnt set in stone yet). Theres not a huge amount of content in yet but id love feedback on anything that is in there right now.

Aim of the game is essentially just to climb as high as you can, there is also one secret feather pickup that can be found though its pretty challenging !

Controls

Z jump

X dash

Arrows keys for movement

Gamepads should work too

You can follow along with the games progress over here on twitter !

https://twitter.com/KittariaSoaring
